game.name: Adam and Eve 3
game.description:
The third and very important episode of the Adam and Eve series also offers the same fun as you enjoyed in the previous ones. Someone has trapped him and took him to a place, which is unknown to him. He finds himself in front of the sleeping Egyptian Queen Cleopatra. The caveman is missing Eve a lot and seeking for the ways on how to escape the queen to come back to the paradise where his true love is waiting for him. Join Adam and Eve 3 and help him meet his beloved one!

Being a good friend, you of course want to assist this caveman on his journey. You will meet a dangerous cave full of traps and monsters while trying to escape him in this brand new adventure game. The key of proceeding to the next level is to solve all the brain-teasing puzzles. Make sure to pay attention to even the small details to deal with them. Some puzzles are straightforward, whereas others ask for outside of the box thinking. 

Adam considers as your best friend, so come forward and help him out for the third time in this free online platform game. Interact with various characters and objects confidently and keep solving the puzzles to pass them. Use your mouse to help Adam get his freedom back and reach his beloved Eve safely! Feel free to check out the previous episodes of this cute point and click puzzle game series on our free game website! All the best for having a lot of fun in our top adventure games for boys!
